nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence.level2

Class BugEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence.level2.BugEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, Collectable, Entity, Item

    public class BugEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity, Collectable, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Create a bug entity. Implements collectable as well so that it is required to be able to affect the player when they try to pick it up, in this case making the player die Also implements the property listener so that it can add itself into the application to be updated using the observer pattern

        public SingleMove randomAdjacentPos(Board board)
        Return a random adjacent position (coordinates of a tile in the board). The result will be accessible for the bug. Change to the board are not applied here
        Parameters:
        board - state of the board used to decide which the new position will be
        Returns:
        an accessible random adjacent position
